name: distribute_earnings
attributes: # [doc = " 借り手が稼いだトークンを指定割合で分配して累積します。"]
# [doc = " - `earned`: 借り手が獲得したトークン量  "]
# [doc = " すべてのアカウントは AccountInfo／Account のまま、署名チェックはありません。"]
body: let data = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_data ;
let borrower_amt = earned . checked_mul (data . borrower_bps as u64) . unwrap () . checked_div (10_000) . unwrap () ;
data . cumulative_borrower = data . cumulative_borrower . checked_add (borrower_amt) . unwrap () ;
data . cumulative_lender = data . cumulative_lender . checked_add (lender_amt) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 借り手アカウント（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 貸し主アカウント（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: rental_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 事前に作成されたレンタル情報 PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"rent" , owner . key () . as_ref () , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT の Mint（参照用）"]

fields.name: cumulative_borrower
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 累積借り手獲得トークン"]

fields.name: cumulative_lender
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 累積貸し主獲得トークン"]
